lead_paragraph: The reason for the change, analysts say, is not rooted in newfound dedication to transparency, but in a desire to sustain Iranian support for Syria’s government.

headline.print_headline: Iran, Once Quiet About Its Syria Casualties, Now Glorifies Them
headline.main: Iran, Once Quiet About Its Casualties in Syria and Iraq, Now Glorifies Them

snippet: The reason for the change, analysts say, is not rooted in newfound dedication to transparency, but in a desire to sustain Iranian support for Syria’s government....
abstract: Iran begins glorifying Iranians who are killed in Syria, using both news and social media to draw attention to their so-called 'defenders of the shrines' of Shiite saints; analysts say military hardliners are publicizing sacrifices of fallen as way to build domestic support for Syrian cause and squelch any settlement which may call for resignation of Syrian Pres Bashar al-Assad.
